title: 超能力MOD炮姐破坏地形
author: ckw233
txt_content:
就是炮姐使用技能可以破坏地形怎么办
大佬告诉我一下。。

replies.author: 拉结尔之书
replies.txt_content:
# Whether the skills will destroy blocks in the world.
    B:destroyBlocks=true改成false
